requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 6th generation Intel
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound is enough
  • Additional Notes: There is a special version for low spec GPUs available. Check beta branch -> forward_shading.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 11th generation Intel or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 3060 or higher
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound is enough
  • Additional Notes: By default game is using RTX if supported. If you have GeForce 2060, then I suggest you to swap to "non_rtx" beta branch. This will disable forced RTX.
